languages.text: "Не беспокойтесь, госпожа Тласс. Не вы одна это видите, не вам одной небезразлична жизнь Лорд-капитана... И не вы одна предприняли меры упреждения".
"Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."
languages.original_text: "Не беспокойтесь, госпожа Тласс. Не вы одна это видите, не вам одной небезразлична жизнь Лорд-капитана... И не вы одна предприняли меры упреждения".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."
"Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."
"Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

"Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

languages.text: "Seid versichert, Herrin Tlass, Ihr seid nicht die Einzige, die es sieht und nicht die Einzige, der das Leben des Lord Captains am Herzen liegt ... Und Ihr seid nicht die Einzige, die proaktive Maßnahmen ergriffen hat."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, Herrin Tlass, Ihr seid nicht die Einzige, die es sieht und nicht die Einzige, der das Leben des Lord Captains am Herzen liegt ... Und Ihr seid nicht die Einzige, die proaktive Maßnahmen ergriffen hat."

languages.text: « Rassurez-vous, maîtresse Tlass, vous n'êtes pas la seule à vous en être rendu compte et à vous inquiéter pour la vie de Sa Seigneurie... Moi aussi, j'ai pris des mesures préventives. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

traits.locale_text: « Rassurez-vous, maîtresse Tlass, vous n'êtes pas la seule à vous en être rendu compte et à vous inquiéter pour la vie de Sa Seigneurie... Moi aussi, j'ai pris des mesures préventives. »

languages.text: «Maestra Tlass, le aseguro que no es la única consciente de ello, ni la única a la que le importa la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... Ni la única que ya está tomando medidas».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

traits.locale_text: «Maestra Tlass, le aseguro que no es la única consciente de ello, ni la única a la que le importa la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... Ni la única que ya está tomando medidas».

languages.text: 「安心してください、トラス様。あなただけが気付いているわけではなく、あなただけがロード・キャプテンの命を気にしているのではありません。そして、あなただけが行動を起こしたわけでもないです」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

traits.locale_text: 「安心してください、トラス様。あなただけが気付いているわけではなく、あなただけがロード・キャプテンの命を気にしているのではありません。そして、あなただけが行動を起こしたわけでもないです」

languages.text: “不必担心，特拉斯女士。意识到这件事情的人不只有你一个，关心舰长大人性命的人也不只有你一个……你并不是唯一一个积极采取措施的人。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

traits.locale_text: “不必担心，特拉斯女士。意识到这件事情的人不只有你一个，关心舰长大人性命的人也不只有你一个……你并不是唯一一个积极采取措施的人。”

languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."

languages.text: "Müsterih ol Üstat Tlass. Ne bunu fark eden ne de Lord Kaptan'ın hayatına dair endişelenen tek kişi sensin. Önleyici tedbirler üzerinde çalışan tek kişi de değilsin."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Mistress Tlass, you are not the only one who sees it, or the only one who cares about the Lord Captain's life... And you are not the only one who has taken proactive measures."
